DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim conduct prospective clinical pilot study investigate use VisionBlue staining administer cataract surgery 20 patient history trabeculectomy glaucoma mean assess function exist filter bleb . The investigator also aim develop standard classification system assess filter bleb function cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Using Type Blue Dye Observe Bleb Function During Cataract Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty ( 20 ) patient history trabeculectomy schedule cataract extraction posterior chamber intraocular lens implant , recruited Wills Eye Hospital Glaucoma Service . Subjects undergo comprehensive ophthalmic evaluation prior schedule cataract surgery . The following data record : Demographic information include age , race , gender , Best correct visual acuity , IOP measure Goldmann applanation tonometry , Bleb morphology evaluation use Indiana Bleb Appearance Grading Scale ( IBAGS ) , Filtering bleb photograph anterior segment OCT bleb take baseline examination . The patient take operate room prepped.Non-preserved Lidocaine ( 1 % ) inject anterior chamber anesthesia , follow injection one complete vial VisionBlue ( 0.5 mL ) . An injection BSS administer paracentesis port IOP approximately 20mHg ( estimate surgeon palpation ) , wait period 20 second . Another injection BSS administer wash VisionBlue . A set microscopic photograph take intraoperative microscope follow washout VisionBlue , bleb grading perform physician : 1+ 4+ stain ( base standard set photo ) . Cataract extraction take place follow typical phacoemulsification procedure . At end case , insertion intraocular lens implant capsular bag removal viscoelastic material eye , additional set microscope photograph take graded scale . The time ( minute ) initial final bleb grading measure record . Intraoperative complication record well . Follow-up subject take place post-operatively 1 day , 1 week , 1 month , 3 month , 6 month follow-up visit . Color photo bleb perform post-operatively 1 day , 1 month , 6 month . At visit , also record number glaucoma medication , post-operative complication need re-operations .
DOC.criteria: Glaucoma patient history previous trabeculectomy surgery schedule cataract surgery . Glaucoma define ( requirement must meet ) : 1 ) Characteristic glaucomatous disc damage demonstrate local narrowing , notching , absence neuroretinal rim absence disc pallor elsewhere . 2 ) Characteristic glaucomatous visual field ( VF ) deficit . Over 21 year age Intraocular surgery laser procedure within 3 month prior plan cataract surgery . Active ocular infection inflammation . History glaucoma drainage device ( tubeshunt ) implantation . Allergy VisionBlue history allergy ophthalmic dye
